DIA_Refir_VZ_Ambient_03_03: I think I'm getting there. Good thing at least the legends of gold were true...
DIA_Refir_VZ_Ambient_03_02: The abyss on one side and those damned gargoyles on the other. I think I'm going crazy!
DIA_Refir_VZ_Ambient_03_01: Let's hope the rest of them get that bridge done quickly, the vision of that precipice scares me.
